section.title: countries master list of Countries
section.para: A comprehensive list of country definitions is provided with the system for use in Address and Currency masters. This information is also used by xTupleCommerce.

note.para: xTuple provides state and/or province information for several, but not all, countries. Be sure to check the countries of your target customers. If the state/province information is missing, you will need to add it yourself. Please also consider contributing this information back to xTuple.

section.para: To access the master list of country definitions, go to System > Setup > Master Information > Countries. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: While country definitions may be added or edited, you should carefully consider before making any changes to the existing definitions. In general, changing country definitions should be discouraged.

section.para: The Countries screen displays information on all existing countries, including country abbreviation, country name, country currency abbreviation, country currency name, and country currency symbol.
